mapper.insert: insert into linkage.global_user(username,iconUrl,description) value (#{username},#{iconUrl},#{description}); insert into linkage.local_global_user(local_username, global_username) value (#{localUserName},#{username});
mapper.select: select username,iconUrl,description,locked from linkage.global_user join linkage.local_global_user on global_user.username = local_global_user.global_username where linkage.local_global_user.local_username = #{username}
select username,iconUrl,description from linkage.global_user where username like #{globalUserName} and locked=0
